== Introduction ==

We are preparing Kubuntu Zesty Zapus (17.04) for Beta 2 on  <nowiki>[[https://wiki.kubuntu.org/ZestyZapus/ReleaseSchedule | March 13, 2017]]</nowiki>. With this '''Beta 2''' pre-release, you can see what we are preparing for our next release.

'''NOTE:''' 

This is Beta 12 Release. 
Kubuntu '''Beta Releases''' are '''NOT''' recommended for:
* Regular users who are not aware of pre-release issues
* Anyone who needs a stable system
* Anyone uncomfortable running a possibly frequently broken system
* Anyone in a production environment with data or workflows that need to be reliable

Kubuntu Beta Releases are recommended for:
* Regular users who want to help us test by finding, reporting, and/or fixing bugs
* Kubuntu, KDE, and Qt developers

== Other Beta 2 Highlights ==

* KDE Frameworks 5.31
* Calligra Office Suite updated to Qt/KF5 version 3.0.0.1
* Krita latest bugfix release - after this popular and advanced digital painting application was split from Calligra.
* K3B updated to a Qt5/KF5 snapshot of the version to be included in KDE's next applications release.
* Okular PDF and document reader is now Qt/KF5 in apps 16.12
* Kdevelop is now the most recent bugfix release of the new version 5.0.x series.
* Numerous application and translation updates from KDE. 

== Known Problems ==
                                                                                                               
* <nowiki>[[https://bugs.kde.org/show_bug.cgi?id=377008|KDE Bug: 377008]]</nowiki> Breeze scrollbar width with Firefox (version >= 52) broken (too wide)
* (Bug:1638473) Blank screen after running oem-config
* (Bug:1530523) Kcm_driver_manager: Infinitely shows Collecting information. Workaround: run ''`sudo update-apt-xapian-index`'' in the commandline before running Driver Manager, or run Muon

== Feedback ==
